title: Vollering vs. Ferrand-Prévot: A Budding GC Rivalry Set to Ignite at the 2025 Vuelta Femenina
content:
The 2025 Vuelta Femenina could be a blockbuster, with reigning champ Demi Vollering facing off against a resurgent Pauline Ferrand-Prévot.

Read the full article at Vollering vs. Ferrand-Prévot: A Budding GC Rivalry Set to Ignite at the 2025 Vuelta Femenina on Velo.
author: ahood
